description: Try our easy to follow Midnight Sun Coke recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Non-alcoholic drink,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Midnight Sun Coke Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crush 10 blueberries and 10 raspberries together until smooth.
Combine berry paste in a glass with juice from 1/2 a lemon, ice and your Coke.
